mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_num AS cart_num, c.user_email AS user_email, c.product_count AS product_count, m.user_name AS user_name, p.product_num AS product_num, p.product_image AS product_image, p.product_name AS product_name, p.sale_price AS sale_price, p.delivery_num AS delivery_num, sale_price*c.product_count AS single_price FROM Member_tb m, Product_tb p, Cart_tb c WHERE m.user_email=c.user_email AND p.product_num = c.product_num AND c.user_email = #{user_email} ORDER BY c.cart_num
